title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner App for Teams
description: The new Microsoft Planner app in Teams is a single, unified work management experience. Assisted by AI, it brings together the simplicity of To Do, the collaboration of Planner and the power of Project into a single and simple solution, that offers individual task management, collaborative work management as well as enterprise work management. Note: The clouds have been updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
